scripts.text:
ALTER TABLE [fnl].[masterlookup]  WITH CHECK ADD  CONSTRAINT [FK_MasterLookup_MasterLookupTypeId_MasterLookupType] FOREIGN KEY([MasterLookupTypeId])
REFERENCES [fnl].[masterlookuptype] ([Id])

ALTER TABLE [fnl].[masterlookup] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_MasterLookup_MasterLookupTypeId_MasterLookupType]


ALTER TABLE [fnl].[AppointmentStatus]  WITH CHECK ADD  CONSTRAINT [FK_AppointmentStatus_StatusStyleId] FOREIGN KEY([StatusStyleId])
REFERENCES [fnl].[MasterLookup] ([Id])

ALTER TABLE [fnl].[AppointmentStatus] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_AppointmentStatus_StatusStyleId]

ALTER TABLE [fnl].[CompanyCategory]  WITH CHECK ADD  CONSTRAINT [FK_CompanyCategory_DefaultSoreExamRoomTypeId] FOREIGN KEY([DefaultSoreExamRoomTypeId])
REFERENCES [fnl].[MasterLookup] ([Id])
